column5: Finished this one over the holidays  When I look at this one I feel the urge to whistle the tune from Andy Griffith show  Threw a change-up on the style as well.  "Another Time"  20 x 30
EXCELLENT Terry Beautiful brush work dude Keep it up and thanks for sharing Jacques
Thats a great painting Bushart. I like that style a lot. Reminds me of when I was a kid fishing my favorite stream behind the house
You have an excellent gift Bushart. I always look forward to your posts.I can almost feel drawn into this one. I wonder if he wants company  Thanks for sharing, and Happy New Year !!!
Happy New Years All....  Yeah this one reminds me of my youth as well
Also reminds me of a spot in Niagara where I used to catch specs almost 50 years ago, the bridge is almost identical. Here's a pic from a historical archive, thanks.
Holy Smokes Dave...My bridge I pulled out of my head---but yours is very, very close---scary
My bridge was a train trestle
My bridge was a bottle.  When I look at your art, I see what I missed all those years

without getting into a huge art discussion---My work tends to evoke various levels of emotion along the way.  I once had a woman break into tears at a show I was doing with one of my paintings---more recently was contacted by a woman in France who the same work had the same affect.  That's about all I can ask for--ok enough with the serious stuff---Is it true that I may be the best angler here on OFC
